title: We'll Meet Again
description: Dorabella & Violetta DenverWhen Violetta Denver last saw her fiance, Jowan Jermyn, he and his regiment were off to defend a weakening Europe from the tyranny of Adolf Hitler. Months, then years, pass without Jowan's return; he is presumed missing in action. Despite the urgings of her family and several would-be suitors, Violetta is determined to wait for him. As she and her happy-go-lucky twin, Dorabella, struggle to do their part during wartime, Dorabella's new beau unwittingly involves the sisters in a dangerous web of intrigue and treason. More than one tragedy must befall the Denver twins before peace is restored.
author: Philippa Carr
